channel.title: Developer Workstation on
channel.description: Recent content in Developer Workstation on

item.title: Building a Developer Workstation
item.description: I recently got a (very nice!) new 2018 MacBook Pro (MBP) with 32G of RAM & a 550GB SSD. It’s fast & sleek, and you could hardly wish for more in a traveling developer’s machine than it provides. Other than a few speedbumps I hit with migration from my old MBP (interesting to resolve but minor on balance) and upgrading MacOS to Mojave (Sentinel’s fault, not Apple’s), I love this machine!
